final_seal.statement: This update captures the governance crisis of 2026-02-11, temporary suspension of THIÊN, CAN's takeover of temporary governance authority, and the state-based execution model for fixing kernel boundary violations. It establishes new constitutional principles: audit-first rule and no-deadline state progression.
final_seal.guarantee: All changes are constitutionally compliant and follow established governance protocols.
